alert.note: Alert for Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 4:03PM CDT until August 01 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Polk County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 403 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Key West, or 9 miles northeast of Grand Forks, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crookston, Euclid, Angus, Tabor, Davidson, Key West and Sherack. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
